text: so i'm trying to import a blog XML file and the format looks fine... but it's giving me an error that it's missing the publish date (though its not)... has anybody ever encountered this?!
What will HubSpot do about this and it's use of cookies? <https://www.chromium.org/Home/chromium-privacy/privacy-sandbox>
All HubSpot cookies are tracking codes are First Party .. they shouldnt be affected by this.
That's what I thought, but what about features like these: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ads/install-pixels-from-external-ad-networks>
do we have the ability yet to edit the style tab on custom modules?
That's what I thought, but what about features like these: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/ads/install-pixels-from-external-ad-networks>

Does anyone know what the limit is for “Number of Posts Per Listing Page” in Blog Listing Page settings? It lets me type in any number I want, but I’m thinking there’s probably a limit? <https://sg.d.pr/5h1nqh>
I have a client with 350 blogs, and setting 500 retuned all 350.  But it might be 500, or 1000 - I just don’t have a large enough dataset to test against!
What function is actually being used to list the blog posts?
Is there any way to test language switcher dropdown without publishing page ??
